challenges.name: Unguided Path
challenges.description: Peglin forgot how to aim! Be careful on where you shoot!
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: Peglin forgot how to aim! Be careful on where you shoot!
localizationDescription.简体中文: 哥布林忘记了如何瞄准！注意你射击的位置！

challenges.name: 360 No-scope
challenges.description: Peglin can't aim and is dizzy. Watch your head! Those orbs are flying everywhere.
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: Peglin can't aim and is dizzy. Watch your head! Those orbs are flying everywhere.
localizationDescription.简体中文: 哥布林不会瞄准而且头还晕晕的。小心你的头！这些弹珠在到处乱飞。

challenges.name: Refreshing Change
challenges.description: Those dragons are at it again! This time they took all your refresh pegs. Good thing you have a refresh orb!
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: Those dragons are at it again! This time they took all your refresh pegs. Good thing you have a refresh orb!
localizationDescription.简体中文: 怪物又在破坏板面了！这次他们破坏了所有的刷新钉，还好你收集了一些碎片并合成了一个刷新弹珠！

challenges.name: Necro Refresher
challenges.description: You lost your refresh pegs again. Channel the dead to refresh again.
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You lost your refresh pegs again. Channel the dead to refresh again.
localizationDescription.简体中文: 这次怪物把了所有的刷新钉供奉给了死神。你只有帮死神收人头才有机会让死神帮你刷新。

challenges.description: Haglin offers you a shortcut to the castle. Do you take it?
challenges.name: Inconsequential Shortcut
challenges.author: Coccolithophor#6083

localizationDescription.English: Haglin offers you a shortcut to the castle. Do you take it?
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你在森林的入口看到了一个隐蔽的隧道，隧道通向一个高大的建筑物。你感觉那头不是很危险，便进入了隧道...

challenges.description: As you start another journey into the forest, you notice another entrance to the mines. Do you enter and catch the enemies unprepared?
challenges.name: Consequential Shortcut
challenges.author: Coccolithophor#6083

localizationDescription.English: As you start another journey into the forest, you notice another entrance to the mines. Do you enter and catch the enemies unprepared?
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你在进入森林时注意到一个密封的地洞，地洞通往地下。你感觉地洞中充满了杀气，但还是鼓足勇气进去了！

challenges.name: Elitist
challenges.description: It's raining elites! Run while you can!
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: It's raining elites! Run while you can!
localizationDescription.简体中文: 冒险之路中充满了精英！尽你所能的活下去吧！

challenges.name: Kleptomania
challenges.description: Every good peglin knows that more shiny objects is good.
